---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/solana/delegate/get-flow-status-stake_account
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/436bd609-48fc-46c4-bde8-1aa921ff2ef5 \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `stake_account_tx_broadcasting` to `stake_account`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "436bd609-48fc-46c4-bde8-1aa921ff2ef5",
  "state": "stake_account",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "create_delegate_tx",
      "inputs": [
        {
          "name": "validator_address",
          "display": "Vote Account Public Key",
          "description": "",
          "type": "string",
          "validations": [
            {
              "type": "presence",
              "options": {}
            },
            {
              "type": "is_vote_account",
              "options": {
                "on": "with_on_chain_validations"
              }
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "stake_account_pubkey": "FNN2VwQy5TMkVegyXyejbwKL5S1SvRkmYHkoK62FReo7",
    "create_stake_account_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "2fbx1JMeYsTVznPF73GM16Qvchj6VddMZuNDJGcKHa7T1TzQf7zkUSmGwgBqJfK1FyxiKwK1U1nQUTYDLGwDmvE7",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "stake_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "withdraw_authority_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "amount": "1.5",
    "validator_address": null,
    "delegate_transaction": null,
    "delegation_active_amount": null,
    "delegation_inactive_amount": null,
    "delegation_status": null,
    "delegation_status_error": null,
    "estimated_active_at": null
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-10-04T19:05:21.115Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-04T19:12:40.708Z"
}
```
